(0,): As a BrokerUser, I want to upload and validate error messages, so that I can ensure errors are properly documented and addressed As a Developer, I want to update the Broker validation rule table, so that I can ensure data quality and accuracy As a Developer, I want to clarify CFDA error codes, so that I can better understand and address errors As a DataUser, I want to access raw agency published files, so that I can analyze and use the data As a Tester, I want to ensure FABS is deriving fields properly, so that I can trust the data
(2,): As a BrokerUser, I want to submit records, so that I can share my data with others As a FabUser, I want to submit FABS files, so that I can share my financial assistance data As a Developer, I want to prevent duplicate transactions, so that I can maintain data integrity
(1,): As a FabUser, I want to get submission status, so that I can track the progress of my submissions As a DataUser, I want to get updated financial assistance data, so that I can have the latest information
